name: Criminalympics (Canceled)
blurb: THE ULTIMATE GAME OF COPS AND ROBBERS BROUGHT TO YOU BY  DEVELOPERS BEHIND: GTA & WIP3OUT.

rewards.reward: No Reward

TAGGED! As an appreciation of our thanks, everyone that backs the project will have their NAME placed in the game credits under the SPECIAL THANKS section!  The size of your name in that section will depend on the level pledged!
JUVENILE DELINQUENT \u2013 Our thanks and appreciation along some Digital Wallpapers, thrown in for good luck.

FIRST TIME OFFENDER \u2013 Digital copy of the Criminalympics game on PC or Mac. The more money we raise, the more events you will get and you can help choose the running order by sending us your top ten events form the list lower down the page.
REPEAT OFFENDER \u2013 Digital copy of the Criminalympics game + Beta access one month early so you can start playing and give us that all important feedback even earlier.
INFORMANT \u2013 DIGITAL PLEDGE PACK; which includes Digital art book with all the concepts and final art put together in one great package, a Digital Soundtrack + Early Beta access.
HIRED HAND \u2013 DIGITAL PLEDGE PACK + KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE PLEDGE PACK; featuring some exclusive goodies on release.
SABOTEUR \u2013 DIGITAL PLEDGE PACK + KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE PLEDGE PACK + Signed limited edition digital art piece.
THUG \u2013 DIGITAL PLEDGE PACK + KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE PLEDGE PACK + Signed limited edition digital concept map of the island prison.
EXTORTIONIST \u2013 DIGITAL PLEDGE PACK + KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE PLEDGE PACK + Additional limited edition Criminalympics t-shirt with an individual backer number just to say thanks!

ENFORCER \u2013 DIGITAL PLEDGE PACK + KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE PLEDGE PACK + ART THIEF PLEDGE PACK; including some glossy prints of the first five events + Additional limited edition Criminalympics t-shirt + Hard copy \u2018Making of\u2019 DVD.

#UNIQUE ITEM: TESTER FOR A DAY! Join our team for the day and test the game for bugs! AN EXCLUSIVE PRE-BETA TESTING SESSION!\r\nIncludes a special limited edition staff 'TESTER' T-Shirt and a credit in the game under the QA section. The days are non transferable and available from July through to September so let us know the day you want! Have lunch on us at our local pub! Excludes accommodation and transport costs. WHY NOT GIFT THIS AS A TREAT FOR SOMEONE SPECIAL! - We will send out an exclusive signed 'appointment certificate' so you can share the love!

HENCHMAN ENFORCER \u2013 DIGITAL PLEDGE PACK + KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE PLEDGE PACK + ART THIEF PLEDGE PACK + GEAR PLEDGE PACK + STOLEN GOODS PLEDGE PACK; including Hard copy of Criminalympics art book, soundtrack and a deck of customised playing cards.

MERCENARY \u2013 DIGITAL PLEDGE PACK + KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE PLEDGE PACK + ART THIEF PLEDGE PACK + GEAR PLEDGE PACK + STOLEN GOODS PLEDGE PACK + COUNTERFIT GOODS PLEDGE PACK; including a Criminalympics branded USB stick and some glossy prints of the first five events.

HITMAN \u2013 DIGITAL PLEDGE PACK + KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE PLEDGE PACK + ART THIEF PLEDGE PACK + GEAR PLEDGE PACK + STOLEN GOODS PLEDGE PACK + COUNTERFIT GOODS PLEDGE PACK + Become part of the crowd! You supply your face and we will put you in the crowd for the victory celebrations! Be immortalised in a game!

CRIMINAL MASTERMIND \u2013 DIGITAL PLEDGE PACK + KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE PLEDGE PACK + ART THIEF PLEDGE PACK + GEAR PLEDGE PACK + STOLEN GOODS PLEDGE PACK + COUNTERFIT GOODS PLEDGE PACK + MASTERMIND PLEDGE PACK; including a limited edition Criminalympics statue + Collaborate with the Creative Director to design custom assets for the game (1 large or 2 small) + Get your name in the credits so you can tell all your mates how much hard work you did + Replace 1 of our shops or stall names with a name of your choice throughout the game + A unique concept drawing of you as a criminal by one of our talented artists + Become part of the crowd! Motion capture by day so you can have your character move and throw Molotov cocktails like you do, followed by an evening with the team, so we can show you the glorious sights of the North East of England (hotel included) *unfortunately we will not be able to cover any travel expenses

THE GODFATHER \u2013 DIGITAL PLEDGE PACK + KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE PLEDGE PACK + ART THIEF PLEDGE PACK + GEAR PLEDGE PACK + STOLEN GOODS PLEDGE PACK + COUNTERFIT GOODS PLEDGE PACK + MASTERMIND PLEDGE PACK + Become part of the crowd! + Collaborate with the team to create your very own Criminalympics in game character + Motion capture by day so you can have your character move and throw Molotov cocktails like you do, followed by an evening with the team, so we can show you the glorious sights of the north east of England (hotel included) *unfortunately we will not be able to cover any travel expenses

#UNIQUE ITEM: THE GAMES DEVELOPER EXPERIENCE! JUNE INTAKE 2013. Join the team at the studio for 1 month over the summer and work along side our developers to contribute to the game! As well as the fun and rewarding experience you will have working in our busy Dev Studio (including frequent trips to the pub!), you will also be listed in the credits as having worked on the game - who know's, if you are good enough then maybe there's a position for you?! Trainee positions open to: Designers, Artists, Animators, Programmers, QA. Accommodation will be taken care of, but excludes transport and subsistence costs.
